_sText:
Ok, this is simply just an optimized version of V2.

People at the TAG zm server complained about the lag, so I did my best to try and optimize it. I added a couple of areaportalwindows in the map to help block out uneeded rendering. I added fade distances to every prop so that they disappear when you get far enough away. I tried to my best to specify the distances corresponding to the map's structure. There may be rare occasions where you see a prop randomly disappear because of the specified distances.

I know this sucks, but I converted it to dev textures. The reason being that they are not as hard to render, making the performance ultimately better.


I added one tiny little addition to the concrete building. It has a pathway around it's mid-section that has 3 small rooms you can get in. I don't know if it's useful, but someone is bound to discover some sort of crazy thing that makes it good.
